alert.note: Alert for Brooks; Grady; Thomas (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 23 at 6:52PM EDT until June 23 at 8:15PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Jefferson County in Big Bend of Florida... Northeastern Leon County in Big Bend of Florida... Southeastern Grady County in southwestern Georgia... Thomas County in south central Georgia... Western Brooks County in south central Georgia... * Until 815 PM EDT. * At 652 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Ochlocknee to 7 miles north of Tallahassee, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Monticello, Thomasville, Boston, Pavo, Coolidge, Morven, Barwick, Alma, Dillon, Everett, Rocky Hill, Miccosukee, Merrillville, Drifton, Lake Miccosukee, Dixie, Festus, Orchard Pond and Lois. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
